post:
StarryDNS.com has been in business since 2015. We colocate our own enterprise hardwares and network devices in tier 3 datacentres. Our goal is to provide reliable and high performance hosting services. 


All KVM VPS include

* Full Root Access
* Enterprise Hardware
* Tier 3 Datacentre
* Premium Network Transits and Peers
* 1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
* Up to 8 usable IPv6 Address in a dedicated /64
* Free Directadmin upon request
* Free BGP session upon request

-- KVM VPS --

* CPU: 2
* RAM: 2GB
* HDD: 20GB
* Bandwidth: 500GB @ 100Mbps
* IP: 1
* Datacentre: Tokyo 4 / Osaka 1 / Singapore 1 / Hong Kong 4
* $6.5 / Month
* Order Link: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=688

Host Node Specification:
We have slightly different specification on each node. The general specs are
2x Intel Xeon E5-2620v4 or similar CPU, 256GB RAM, 4x 2TB SAS


-- Dedicated Servers (Tokyo 4) --

* CPU: Intel E3-1226v3
* RAM: 16GB
* HDD: 480GB SSD
* Bandwidth: 5TB@100Mbps
* IP: /29 - 5 Usable
* IPv6: /64
* $79 / Month
* Order Link: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=690

-- Dedicated Servers (Hong Kong 4) --

* CPU: Intel E3-1226v3
* RAM: 16GB
* HDD: 1TB HDD
* Bandwidth: 5TB@100Mbps
* IP: /29 - 5 Usable
* IPv6: /64
* $79 / Month
* Order Link: https://my.starrydns.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=689


Test IP and looking glass can be found at https://www.starrydns.com/en/speedtest


FAQ:
- What payment methods do you accept?
_We accept Paypal, Credit card, and bank transfer._

- What's the set up time?
_For new customers, verfication process will be performed, which takes up to 24 hours._

- Do you provide refund?
_Yes, we provide 3 day money back guarantee for your first order._

- What control panel do you use for VPS?
_We use our in-house control panel, through which you can install OS, mount ISO, perform power and network control._

Please refer to https://www.starrydns.com/en/tos for terms of service and https://www.starrydns.com/en/aup for acceptable use policy.

For any inquiries, please contact us at service@starrydns.com or [open a support ticket](https://my.starrydns.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1 "open a support ticket").
